results.title: Tesla Full Year 2024 Analysis — A Review of Actual Performance ...
results.content: Tesla had an 18.4% automotive gross profit margin (including regulatory credits) in 2024 and 23.3% in 2023 as automotive revenues declined by 6% to $77 billion from $82.4 billion year-on-year. The Tesla Energy segment’s revenues rose 67% to $10 billion in 2024 from $6 billion in 2023, while its gross profit margin rose slightly to 26.2% from 23.3%. Tesla Services and Other had a 5.8% gross profit margin in 2024, down from 6.2% in 2023. Tesla’s gross profit margins were 17.9% in 2024 and 18.2% in 2023 due to significant incentives offered by Tesla to sell more EVs and drive up demand. Tesla’s operating profit margin fell to 7.2% in 2024 from 9.2% in 2023. Tesla’s GAAP net income fell by 53% from approximately $15 billion in 2023 to $7 billion in 2024, with net profit margins of 15.5% and 7.3% respectively. Tesla’s 2023 net profit was impacted by a one-time non-cash $5.7 billion tax benefit. Tesla's energy business contributed 15% of gross profit in 2024 up from 6% in 2023.
